title: The 1v7 INSANE AI Challenge is impossible (no, Beastyqt has not done it) - StarCraft 2
excerpt: I have challenged StarCraft 2 Pros to take on 7 INSANE Cheater AIs at once! Serral has said it is impossible unless maybe they're all Zergs. The first person brave enough to try it is Spirit (Soul), a Terran player. He takes on 7 Random insane AIs all on Any Build. Then he tried 7 Zergs. Then he tries
